name: Egypt vs. Aliens
description:
In the third year of the reign of Bauefra, fifth Pharaoh of his dynasty, a series of portals were opened and an army of advanced aliens known as the Annunaki poured forth, intent on enslaving mankind. As the commander of the Pharaoh's armies you must confront the alien tide and drive them back from whence they came! 

Egypt vs. Aliens is a single player turn based strategy game in which you control the Egyptian army across a map made up of hexagonal cells. A basic economic system allows you to earn gold and buy new units. The game currently contains one level although I may develop it further if it generates any interest.
